# CFURLEnumeratorSkipDescendents(_:)

**Function**

Tells a recursive enumerator not to descend into the directory at the URL that was returned by the most recent call to the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLEnumeratorGetNextURL(_:_:_:)] function.

## Declaration

```swift
func CFURLEnumeratorSkipDescendents(_ enumerator: CFURLEnumerator!)
```

## Parameters

- **enumerator**: The enumerator.

## Discussion

A call to this function is ignored in the following cases:

- The [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLEnumeratorGetNextURL(_:_:_:)] function has never been called with this enumerator.
- The last URL returned by the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLEnumeratorGetNextURL(_:_:_:)] function is not a directory.
- The enumerator is not a directory enumerator that was created with the [doc://com.apple.corefoundation/documentation/CoreFoundation/CFURLEnumeratorOptions/descendRecursively] option.
